channel.title: Shit be going down at the Ward son
channel.description:
Well what the fuck. Looks like Infinity Ward is next on the Activision choppy choppy list.
[url]https://g4tv.com/thefeed/blog/post/702911/Security-Appears-Unannounced-At-Infinity-Ward-Studio-Heads-Missing-Staff-Freaked-Out-.html[/url]
[url]https://kotaku.com/5483348/report-strange-things-are-afoot-at-infinity-ward-president-ousted?skyline=true&s=i[/url] [quote] Security guards have stormed the developer, with studio heads currently missing in action.
Infinity Ward leads Vince Zampella and Jason West are reported to have met with Activision earlier today, but have not been seen since.
We're well aware by now that Activision isn't shy about bringing the hammer down on its owned development studios, with Infinity Ward's Call of Duty games still bringing in the billions, we can't imagine why Bobby Kotick and company would be so displeased with its star studio. [/quote]
[quote] [img]https://gfxlink.com/images/60547850060744478960.jpg[/img]
That's supposedly from Modern Warfare 2 game director and Infinity Ward president Jason West's Facebook page. [url=https://www.linkedin.com/profile?viewProfile=&key=3031043&authToken=3UcA&authType=NAME_SEARCH&locale=en_US&srchindex=1&pvs=ps&goback=.fps_jason+west+infinity+ward_*1_*1_*1_*1_*1_*1_*1_Y_*1_*1_*1_false_1_R_true_CC,N,I,G,PC,ED,FG,L,DR_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2_*2]West's LinkedIn profile[/url] indicates he is no longer working at Infinity Ward as of March 2010. Could Infinity Ward's top brass been given the heave ho? [/quote]

item.title: Shit be going down at the Ward son
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
Elpants:

axed the entire studio.

No, just the 2 guys who ran the studio

Read full topic

item.title: Shit be going down at the Ward son
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:
Well what the fuck. Looks like Infinity Ward is next on the Activision choppy choppy list.

https://g4tv.com/thefeed/blog/post/702911/Security-Appears-Unannounced-At-Infinity-Ward-Studio-Heads-Missing-Staff-Freaked-Out-.html

https://kotaku.com/5483348/report-strange-things-are-afoot-at-infinity-ward-president-ousted?skyline=true&s=i

Security guards have stormed the developer, with studio heads currently missing in action.

Infinity Ward leads Vince Zampella and Jason West are reported to have met with Activision earlier today, but have not been seen since.

We’re well aware by now that Activision isn’t shy about bringing the hammer down on its owned development studios, with Infinity Ward’s Call of Duty games still bringing in the billions, we can’t imagine why Bobby Kotick and company would be so displeased with its star studio.

That’s supposedly from Modern Warfare 2 game director and Infinity Ward president Jason West’s Facebook page. West’s LinkedIn profile indicates he is no longer working at Infinity Ward as of March 2010. Could Infinity Ward’s top brass been given the heave ho?

Read full topic
item.source: Shit be going down at the Ward son
